description: Foundational C programming, known for efficiency and versatility, forming the basis for software development.
Essential for software development, understanding step-by-step problem-solving procedures in computer science.
C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms, powerful features for complex problem-solving.
Fundamental data structures - arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, essential for efficient data management.
Python OOP - classes, objects, inheritance, enhancing code organization and reusability.
Systematic software development emphasizing quality, scalability, and maintainability.
Amazon Web Services for scalable, reliable cloud services, efficient application deployment, and data management.
MySQL - open-source, relational DBMS known for scalability, performance, and robust data security.
Critical problem-solving skills applicable in programming and life, overcoming obstacles and achieving goals.
